Uses of Class
org.naomi.regex.Pattern

  • Packages that use Pattern 
    Package Description
    Examples  
    org.naomi.regex
    Provides the power of regular expressions without regular expressions.

    • Uses of Pattern in Examples

      Subclasses of Pattern in Examples 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DateTime
      Example class that uses Naomi to parse an Email date-time component, as specified by the IETF date-time specification (RFC2822).

    • Uses of Pattern in org.naomi.regex

      Subclasses of Pattern in org.naomi.regex 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BackReferencePattern
      An instance of this Pattern matches the same string matched by some previously matched Pattern (specified by the referent argument of the BackReferencePattern Constructor).
      class  BoundaryPattern
      An instance of BoundaryPattern matches, on each repetition, the left or right boundary (as specified) of some string, e.g., the start or end of a line, word or non-word.
      class  BuiltInCharClass
      An instance of BuiltInCharClass is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character in the pre-defined set of characters denoted by its instantiating BuiltIn Enum constant.
      class  CharClass
      An instance of any subclass of this abstract class is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character in the set of characters that define that instance.
      class  CharSequencePattern
      An instance of CharSequencePattern matches, on each repetition, the entire character sequence in the String or other CharSequence (e.g., CharBuffer or Segment of a character array) used to instantiate the CharSequencePattern.
      class  CollectionCharClass
      An instance of CollectionCharClass is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character in the Collection of Characters used to instantiate the CollectionCharClass.
      class  ComplementCharClass 
      class  ConcatenatePattern
      A ConcatenatePattern matches the concatenation of strings matched by the specified instances of Pattern.
      class  DelegateCharClass 
      class  EnumPattern
      An instance of EnumPattern matches, on each repetition, any of the strings corresponding to the constants of the Enum used to instantiate the EnumPattern.
      class  ExplicitCharClass
      An instance of ExplicitCharClass is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character in the String or other CharSequence used to the instantiate the ExplicitCharClass.
      class  FilterCharClass
      An instance of FilterCharClass is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character that lies inclusively (in the normal collating sequence) between FilterCharClass.getFirst() and FilterCharClass.getLast() and satisfies filter(Char).
      class  GlobPattern
      A GlobPattern is a Pattern that behaves like a Unix shell filename matching pattern.
      class  IntersectCharClass
      An instance of IntersectCharClass is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character that is in all of the CharClasses in the instantiating Collection or list of CharClasses.
      class  IntervalCharClass
      An instance of IntervalCharClass is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character that lies inclusively (in the normal collating sequence) between two specified characters.
      class  OrPattern
      An OrPattern matches any string matched by at least one of the specified instances of Pattern.
      class  RegExpPattern
      A RegExpPattern matches the strings matched by a given regular expression.
      class  UnionCharClass
      An instance of UnionCharClass is a Pattern which, on each repetition, matches any single character that is in any of the CharClasses in its instantiating Collection or list of CharClasses.
      Methods in org.naomi.regex that return Pattern 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pattern Pattern.addAlterationListener(AlterationListener alterListener) 
      Pattern Pattern.altered()
      This should be called when any change is made or occurs which might affect which strings this Pattern matches.
      Pattern GlobPattern.altered() 
      Pattern Pattern.altered(Pattern src)
      Is public only because Java requires it to be so.
      abstract Pattern Pattern.copy()
      Copy this Pattern.
      Pattern Pattern.copyTo(Pattern other)
      Copies data from this to other.
      Pattern BackReferencePattern.getReferent() 
      Pattern Pattern.notifyAlterationListeners(Pattern src) 
      Pattern Pattern.removeAlterationListener(AlterationListener alterListener) 
      Pattern Pattern.setCaseSensitive(boolean caseSensitive)
      Defaults to true
      Pattern Pattern.setMaxCount(Integer max)
      The default is 1; max==null means no maximum.
      Pattern Pattern.setMaxCountToUnbounded() 
      Pattern Pattern.setMinAndMaxCount(int min, Integer max) 
      Pattern Pattern.setMinCount(int min)
      The default is 1.
      Pattern Pattern.setMoniker(String moniker)
      moniker may be any String.
      Pattern Pattern.setPolicy(Policy policy)
      The default is Policy.greedy
      Pattern Pattern.setPretty(Pretty pretty)
      Determines whether getRegularExpression() returns a more human readable, or, at least, a less human unreadable String.
      Methods in org.naomi.regex that return types with arguments of type Pattern 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Pattern> DelegateCharClass.computeKids() 
      List<Pattern> Pattern.getKids() 
      List<Pattern> Pattern.getUsedPatterns()
      The caller may modify the returned list.
      Methods in org.naomi.regex with parameters of type Pattern 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pattern Pattern.altered(Pattern src)
      Is public only because Java requires it to be so.
      AlterationListener AlterationListener.altered(Pattern src)
      This should be called when any change is made or occurs which might affect which strings this Pattern matches.
      Policy Policy.checkCounts(Pattern pattern)
      Checks that the min and max count of pattern are compatible with this Policy.
      Pattern Pattern.copyTo(Pattern other)
      Copies data from this to other.
      int Matcher.end(Pattern other)
      Returns the offset after the last character of the subsequence captured by other during the previous match operation.
      static BuiltInInterface Utilities.find(Pattern pattern, boolean nullOK, Action action)
      Find a BuiltIn Enum constant of CoreBuiltIn, LocaleBuiltIn, UniBlockBuiltIn, or UniScriptBuiltIn (searched in that order), matched by the specified Pattern.
      static Enum<?> Utilities.find(Pattern pattern, boolean nullOK, Action action, Class<? extends Enum<?>>... enums)
      Find an Enum constant matched by the specified Pattern.
      Enum<?> EnumPattern.getValue(Pattern pattern)
      Returns the first constant of the Enum whose toString() is matched by pattern or null, if none.
      String Matcher.group(Pattern pattern)
      Returns the input subsequence captured by the given Pattern during the previous match operation.
      Pattern Pattern.notifyAlterationListeners(Pattern src) 
      BackReferencePattern BackReferencePattern.setReferent(Pattern referent) 
      int Matcher.start(Pattern other)
      Returns the start index of the subsequence captured by other during the previous match operation.
      Constructors in org.naomi.regex with parameters of type Pattern 
      Constructor and Description
      BackReferencePattern(Pattern referent)
